reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient for feedings away from home and for travel.
reviews.reviewText: LOVE these adorable bags to store formula for when we are away from home. I prefer these disposable bags over the plastic multi compartment formula container we were using prior because it takes up less space, keeps servings separate (the plastic containers would always have formula spill from one compartment to another messing up the per-measured portions), keeps moisture out, and overall is much more easy and convenient to use. The design is fun to look at also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and a huge space saver
reviews.reviewText: I love the convenience and ease of use with these bags. The bottom tears easily. I would note that you should leave a little air in the packet so you can shake the powder to the sealed end before you rip open the funnel side. That way you don't get powder all over the place. Once you have opened the funnel side, the powder pours out easily. I love how compact these are in comparison to the formula containers. I can easily carry 6 of these without taking up a lot of space in the diaper bag. Space is a commodity that I don't have a lot of with twins!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very satisfied for these reasons...
reviews.reviewText: Good design, high quality. The upper opening is of good size, so it's easy to pour in the formula powder from the spoons. The zipper is very strong and seals well. The bag can hold up to six spoons of formula powder (for 12 oz of milk), but I usually use three spoons, then the bags are nice and flat, easy to stack and space-saving in my diaper bag. I like the funnel-shaped, narrow outlet especially, because it reaches into the bottles, making it hard to spill. I like this feature especially because I use narrow necked bottles of Simba and Dr. Brown brands which are hard to fill with formula spoon and formula dispensers; also because I often make formula when the car is driving. The bags are made of safety certified material, solid, but easy to tear at the tear notches. I'm really satisfied with them. I recommend this product especially when you need formula bags during traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Storage Bags for Large Quantity
reviews.reviewText: Great product I didn’t know I needed. I got to use them during an 8 hour trip with my twins. I prepared all the bags the day before and labeled them with their name, date, and ounces. It made it so easy to identified and carry even when I had twelve they barely took up any room. I will definitely buy more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2018
Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Love these!! Work just as expected, awesome quality, perfect thickness and don't take up a ton of room in the diaper bag!! You can easily reuse them since the powder is dry if you just empty them into the bottle from the ziplock end instead of wrapping off the bottom, but the price is pretty great if you use them as disposable too. Not to mention they're dang cute!! I always get questions about them when we're out. Other mamas seem to love the idea and end up purchasing them after seeing us use them as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These bags are awesome, I honestly used these for my powdered drink mix to take with me in the car the top has a very durable zip lock seal and the end is dotted to rip also the end is only paper and not that plastic paper coating at the end making it impossible to rip lol rips easily .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & compact
reviews.reviewText: These are great for travel. They take up less space than the bulky formula dispenser I have.
